name: Spectre (itch) (Harry OConnor)
description:
This game was done as a four-week project between two designers on a brief of "fear to happiness through surprise".

Spectre is a prototype top down 2.5D shooter set in a fictional future where robotic combatants and humanoid beasts occupy cities and towns once populated by humans. The player is an enigmatic figure accompanied by a small orb like being that has a moral hold over the player, demanding the player execute enemies to harvest their energy to replenish its health.

Team:

Harry O'Connor

Ashe Stevens
